Title: Marshcrawla Sloggoth
Legend: Creeping along on all fours come the Marshcrawla Sloggoths, sniffing the air to home in on fresh prey. On their backs are howdahs full of sneaky grots, banging war-drums and cackling as their vile beasts catch and squish the foe.
Intro: A Marshcrawla Sloggoth is armed with Catchin’ Nets and Snatcha-stikks, and Raking Claws.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Trophy Finga

Rules.Name: Grot Snatcha-Krew
Rules.Fluff: The grots that ride atop a Marshcrawla Sloggoth are constantly on the lookout for new victims to grab and chain up.
Rules.Rule: Grot Snatcha-krew: At the end of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy model within 2" of this unit and roll a dice. If the roll is at least double that model’s Wounds characteristic, it is slain.

Rules.Name: Krew Drummer
Rules.Fluff: The drummer that rides with a snatcha-krew beats out a powerful rhythm that inspires nearby allies to fight at their hardest.
Rules.Rule: Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly units that are wholly within 18" of any friendly units with this ability.

Rules.Name: Regeneration
Rules.Fluff: Being a type of troggoth, the sloggoth is able to regrow injured flesh almost as quickly as it is harmed.
Rules.Rule: In your hero phase, you can roll a dice for this unit. If you do so, on a 4+, heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this unit.
